WHO WE ARE Paragraph is an international publishing and events company. Founded in 1997, Paragraph has numerous well-known and popular magazines, publications, awards and web sites, as well as the Paragraph Partnership offering its services to clients throughout the world.
WHAT WE DO We produce and deliver high quality magazines, web sites, awards and events in specialist sectors and markets to both trade and consumer. We also offer bespoke client services to produce one-off publications that meet our customers' strict specifications.
MISSION STATEMENT Paragraph is committed to delivering top quality products and services within the drinks, travel, and hospitality sectors.
